publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7282 Linda Fabiani: Theatre Nemo is 10 Years Oldâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Theatre Nemo on its 10th anniversary; considers that Theatre Nemo has done tremendous work in helping to stop reoffending, assisting people in recovering from mental illness, helping them reconnect with their communities and giving people a new outlook and the confidence to take responsibility to change their lives for the better, and looks forward to another 10 years of similar achievement.
S3M-7282 Theatre Nemo is 10 Years Old (lodged on 27 October 2010) Jamie Hepburn*
